description:
The kids have a special lesson on poems at school, and their teacher is B.B.B.`s grandpa. It turns out he`s a "Poem Ambassador" who teaches others the wonders of poems! All the students take interest in poems, and when Grandpa yells "Let`s poem!" they recite their own, one after another. Just then, Grandpa`s old rival, the "Poem Guru," appears. Who will win the poem showdown?!
Source: crunchyroll
